data.text: Alot of news about the future of @Tesla. Can't wait to have a robot serving my lazy ass. Sorry @elonmusk but I'm hoping the stock goes down so I can afford to accumulate a few more shares.
@thunderf00t I can understand people defending Tesla, SpaceX etc. But how anyone can defend Boring is incomprehensible

4. said that all FSD owners would get Beta this year!
5. Anounced Future autonomous car 2024
6. Future Tesla Bot prototype this or next year. Working in 2 years.
7. Promised Semi, Cybertruck and Roadster next year!
8. Got the highest ZEV-credits ever, due to lack of competitors!

#Tesla have the latest 3 months…
1. Started 2 brand new high tech factories, the best car factories on the planet!
2. delivered Q1 report that crushed all expectations, even the biggest bull!
3. anounced that there are 100.000 FSD-beta users out there!
